data.name: AboutBannerSubTitle
data.value: A trust will give you a hearty smile.

data.name: FindNanjingBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No.17, Sec. 4, Nanjing E. Rd., Songshan Dist., Taipei City 105, Taiwan

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from the Taipei Arena, close to the Breeze Center, Taipei Arena shopping district, and 1 minute walk from the MRT Taipei Arena Station Exit 1.

data.name: FindNanjingBranchDesc2
data.value: With more than 100 ping professional venues combined with a variety of training equipment, you can optimize your training by exercising without being restricted by venues.

data.name: FindXinyiBranchAdd
data.value: Rm. 2, 2F., No.16, Sec. 5, Xinyi Rd., Xinyi Dist., Taipei City 110, Taiwan

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc1
data.value: Across from Taipei 101 (Upstairs of the restaurant- 1Bite2Go), right at the MRT Taipei 101/World Trade Center Exit 3.

data.name: FindXinyiBranchDesc2
data.value: Own a unique personal training venue that has both indoor and outdoor in Taipei City. Professional, spacious and private training space, combined with an outdoor sports lawn and PU runway, you are not limited to indoor venues. Having sports space in the outdoor area increases the diversity of training programs. Fitness not only ends with fitness, but also has better functions toward lives.

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchAdd
data.value: B1, No.21, Ln. 75, Sec. 1, Da’an Rd., Da’an Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc1
data.value: Located at B1 of the building behind Dinghao Market, 2 minute walk from MRT Zongxiao Fuxing station Exit 3 (or Exit 14 of East Metro Mall)

data.name: FindZhongxiaoBranchDesc2
data.value: Rarely seen indoor high ceiling personal training venue, bright lighting space, combined with a variety of training equipment, separate bath and shower, allowing you to freshen up more comfortably.

data.name: JoinUsDesc
data.value: Founded in 2015, Beyond Fitness is devoted to developing professional one-on-one personal trainers. Beyond Fitness has established from Nanjing, Taipei Arena and has expanded Xinyi 101 and Zhongxiao Dunhua branches in three years. Behind all these, we are just a group of partners who want to let action and professional practice speak louder than words; most importantly, and those clients who have faith in us. We believe that education should be personalized and so as training. We should customize accordingly to individuals’ need that is most suitable for "people", guiding customers to live a better life.

data.name: JoinUsFeature1Desc
data.value: Anytime and anywhere, we give warm feedback

data.name: JoinUsFeature2Desc
data.value: We teach, we learn, we grow together

data.name: JoinUsFeature3Desc
data.value: Care from the heart, bond as a family

data.name: OpportunityBannerSubTitle
data.value: is putting health at the right place

data.name: OpportunityFeaturesDesc1
data.value: Opportunity to work with outstanding partners

data.name: OpportunityFeaturesDesc4
data.value: A salary allows you to live a comfortable life

data.name: OpportunityFeaturesDesc5
data.value: Have fun at work, working while having fun!

data.name: JoinUsContactDesc
data.value: Introduce yourself, and we’ll get in touch if there’s a role that seems like a good match.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc1
data.value: Founded in 2014, Beyond Fitness is one of the largest custom training centers in Taiwan. We have more than 50 employees, providing personalized training services, corporate team health strategies, professional sports education training, corporate health consultants and more.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc3
data.value: As professional fitness instructors, we provide training in a scientific and systematic way. We help you in a sincere manner and bring the highest benefits and value to each training course.

data.name: AboutVedioDesc4
data.value: We believe that “If we help you change your lifestyle and lead you to a healthier life, you will naturally find the value and quality of your life.”

data.name: AboutVedioDeclaration2
data.value: Together we build values and attitudes towards sports that bring meaning to our lives.
